mapper.select: select rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardCategory from (select rownum rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, to_char(boardDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') boardDate, boardCategory from (select boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardCategory from board order by boardDate desc) where boardCategory = '0') where rno < 4
select count(*) from board where boardCategory = 0

select rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardHits, boardDate, boardCategory from (select rownum rno, boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardHits, to_char(boardDate,'yyyy-mm-dd') boardDate, boardCategory from (select boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardHits, boardDate, boardCategory from board order by boardDate desc)) where (rno between #{start} and #{end}) and (boardCategory = '0')
select boardIdx, memberId, boardTitle, boardContent, boardHits, boardDate, boardCategory from board where boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
mapper.insert: insert into board ( boardIdx, memberId, boardHits, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardUpdateDate, boardCategory ) values ( sequ_board_boardIdx.nextval, #{memberId}, 0, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, null, 0 )
mapper.update: update board set boardTitle = #{boardTitle}, boardContent = #{boardContent}, boardUpdateDate = sysdate, boardCategory = 0 where boardIdx = #{boardIdx}
